title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Your privacy is our top priority

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: DanceTwin is designed with privacy at its core. We believe your dance practice should stay private.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.content: The only data stored locally on your device:
items: Session results (only if you choose to export)

processing.title: How Processing Works
processing.content: All AI pose estimation and scoring happens entirely in your browser using WebAssembly. Your video frames are processed in real-time and immediately discarded. Nothing is sent to any server.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: DanceTwin uses MediaPipe for pose estimation, which runs entirely in your browser. No data is sent to Google or any other third party.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We do not use cookies for tracking. The only cookies used are for essential functionality like remembering your language preference.
